item.title: Describe Your Participation in a Documentation Effort
item.description: The App: The development team developed a mobile App for worldwide practitioners to practice meditation. The practitioners can: register for upcoming meditation courses; record their everyday meditation practice; write journals to reflect on their practicing results; watch online videos from previous classes; download massive meditation instructional videos and music; offer lights for their loved ones; and more. What I Did: I participated in the documentation project of this mobile App.
